SessionCreateRQ (Stateful ATH) create session and prepare vars Copy

exec: // Generate a unique ID for profile services

request.description:
Used to create stateful sessions on Sabre's Passenger Sales System
Also used to set variables for Stateful API's

exec: // Solves problem when specific APIs return different namespaces randombly ie. ns8, ns9: TP APIs

body.raw:
{{header}}

<Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ xmlns="http://www.sabre.com/eps/schemas" Version="6.55">
	<Filter CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" FilterID="*" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" FilterName="{{filterName}}" FilterTypeCode="TVL">
		<Profile>
			<TPA_Identity ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" UniqueID="*" ProfileTypeCode="TVL" DomainID="{{pcc}}"/>
			<Traveler>
				<Customer>
					<PersonName InformationText="Info">
						<GivenName>John</GivenName>
						<SurName>Kowalski</SurName>
					</PersonName>
					<Telephone>
						<FullPhoneNumber>6826051000</FullPhoneNumber>
					</Telephone>
					<Email EmailAddress="Test.Create.Booking@Sabre.com"/>
				</Customer>
			</Traveler>
		</Profile>
	</Filter>
</Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ>

{{footer}}

exec: // Solves problem when specific APIs return different namespaces randombly ie. ns8, ns9: TP APIs

body.raw:
{{header}}

<Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ xmlns="http://www.sabre.com/eps/schemas" Version="6.55">
	<Profile CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00">
		<TPA_Identity ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" UniqueID="*" ProfileTypeCode="TVL" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ProfileName="{{profileName}}"/>
		<Traveler>
			<Customer BirthDate="1990-01-01" GenderCode="M">
				<PersonName>
					<GivenName>John</GivenName>
						<SurName>Smith</SurName>
				</PersonName>
				<Telephone>
					<FullPhoneNumber>6826051000</FullPhoneNumber>
				</Telephone>
				<Email EmailAddress="Test.Create.Booking@Sabre.com"/>
			</Customer>
			<TPA_Extensions>
				<AssociatedFilters FilterID="{{filterId}}" FilterName="{{filterName}}" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00"/>
			</TPA_Extensions>
		</Traveler>
	</Profile>
</Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ>

{{footer}}

request.description: Used to close stateful sessions on Sabre's Passenger Sales System

request.description:

Also used to set variables for Stateful API's

body.raw:
{{header}}

	<Filter CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" FilterID="*" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" FilterName="{{filterName}}" FilterTypeCode="TVL">
		<Profile>
			<TPA_Identity ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" UniqueID="*" ProfileTypeCode="TVL" DomainID="{{pcc}}"/>
			<Traveler>
				<Customer>
					<PersonName InformationText="Info">
						<GivenName>Pawel</GivenName>
						<SurName>Mrozicki</SurName>
					</PersonName>
					<Telephone>
						<FullPhoneNumber>6826051000</FullPhoneNumber>
					</Telephone>
					<Email EmailAddress="Test.Create.Booking@Sabre.com"/>

		</Profile>
	</Filter>
</Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ>

{{header}}

<Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ xmlns="http://www.sabre.com/eps/schemas" Version="6.55">
	<Profile CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00">
		<TPA_Identity ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" UniqueID="*" ProfileTypeCode="TVL" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ProfileName="{{profileName}}"/>

			<Customer BirthDate="1990-01-01" GenderCode="M">
				<PersonName>
					<GivenName>John</GivenName>
						<SurName>Smith</SurName>
				</PersonName>
				<Telephone>
					<FullPhoneNumber>6826051000</FullPhoneNumber>
				</Telephone>
				<Email EmailAddress="Test.Create.Booking@Sabre.com"/>
			</Customer>
			<TPA_Extensions>
				<AssociatedFilters FilterID="{{filterId}}" FilterName="{{filterName}}" DomainID="{{pcc}}" ClientCode="TN" ClientContextCode="SBS" CreateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00" UpdateDateTime="{{start_date}}T00:00:00"/>
			</TPA_Extensions>
		</Traveler>
	</Profile>
</Sabre_OTA_ProfileCreateRQ>
